extendedInfo.description: 'The Hundy Club' or 'Hundred Club' is an exclusive club in which membership can only be attained by completing 100 shots of beer in 100 minutes. The buzzer will go off every minute and count down from 100. If you cannot make your shot within the time of the buzzer you must have another. A true race to the bottom! UPDATE: We are currently planning an update for this app, please let us know of anything that would make your experience more enjoyable in the comments below.

reviews.title: Supurb
reviews.comment: What else can I say this is the only app that does what it says with out adds and has the added joy of aiding in the process of getting intoxicated  Well done to the team of developers that created it look forward to your next apps
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Disappointed, 40 odd shots in and it starts over, had no idea what number we were up to, happened 3 times, got smashed, but disappointing application.
reviews.author: A Google User
